name: Buggy Boi
description:
Description

You are a small green bug and your goal is to reach the end while the game bugs are either your benefit or your detriment.

This is a short game created for the Wowie Jam 2.0 which is my first game jam submission. The game jam lasted 72 hours and the theme was: "Intentional Bugs"

Controls

Use the arrow keys or WASD to walk around while game bugs interrupt your regular movement.

License

The entire project is licensed under the MIT License. You can use any part of the project files independently from each other. For example, you could use the tilesheet for your own game or tweak it to fit your game's style or theme.

It would be nice but is not required that you give credit to me. It would also be nice if you messaged me or commented so I can see your final product.
